body.name: Furomate Over The Toilet Storage Cabinet with Shelves and Doors, 32.3''W Free standing Toilet Shelf Space Saver with Anti-Tip Design and Adjustable Bottom Bar, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 4 mins
features: 【Sleek Lines, Modern Style】With a sleek design of farmhouse contemporary lines, this over-the-toilet storage shelf has a fine neutral finish bringing a touch of understated style and utility to your bathroom. All the features make such a small shelving to get your bathroom to life.

【Space-saving Solution 】The bathroom is too small to store your items? Is your bathroom tiny? Let the toiletries on the wall make full use of the space over the toilet without occupying the floor area. The 6-tier freestanding over the toilet storage unit helps keep your toiletries organized without taking up too much floor space, and the shelf of the over-the-toilet bathroom rack allows you to place items as you like.
【Adjustable Shelf, Flexible Storage】Shelves, including a fixed shelf, a movable shelf, and a bottom shelf to accommodate items of different heights. You can adjust the movable shelf heights.

【Easy Assembly】This simple bath furniture cabinet arrives at your door as a flat pack with a well-illustrated user's guide and all fasteners in the package. A screwdriver is the only tool you need to piece it up. If you are handy with tools, it usually takes less than 30 minutes. The craftsmanship of the farmhouse complements the simple tone of the shelf and cabinet, creating a transitional look.

【Easy to clean】The wooden bathroom shelves over the toilet are constructed of CARB-P2 compliant MDF all over the structure to enhance stability and to secure your safety in daily use that won't wobble for regular use, the overall surface is a waterproof and moisture-proof process, you can spend little time on post-cleaning.
【Warm Reminder】Please note 32.3'' width before ordering. Make sure enough space for the shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as nice as in the pictures!
reviews.reviewText: With my bathroom being so small, I was hoping this would be a perfect solution. Indeed, it was it fits exactly in the small space that is in the bathroom. It’s nice and sturdy and was fairly easy to put together. Well, in this bathroom that I have for over two years, I absolutely love the fact that it provides additional storage and space that I haven’t yet to had. Check the measurements and if it fits, make sure you buy this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet worked absolutely perfect in my bathroom. It has great storage and is super well made and sturdy. I saw a lot of comments on needing two people or that it took a really long time so I was hesitant however I did it all by myself and it was super easy if you follow step by step. It’s spacious on the inside and can hold a lot. It also doesn’t feel cheap and wobbly all the pieces and shelves are very solid. I highly recommend if you need more storage in your bathroom and can’t mount a cabinet to get this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars We love it
reviews.reviewText: It took us a few hours to put it together & although the directions could have been more easily wrote out, it wasn't difficult to assemble if you pay attention & follow the direction. Other than that, the design is very cool & its well made. It definitely gave us the extra space we needed, along with an elegant look as far as a bathroom goes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn't have a space for different medical items in my bathroom. I found this and LOVE it! Compliments my bathroom, TONS of storage, easy to put together. My home is decorated with a country theme.. this fit right in. I HIGHLY recomened this bathroom storage cupboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is fantastic! It is approximately 50 lbs so not too heavy but not easy for one person. It took a little under an hour to assemble with one other person to help. The directions were all pictures and everything lined up well during assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this storage cabinet for the bathroom. Matched our sink and cabinet perfectly. We did screw it into the wall with the hardware they send with the cabinet to secure it, 10/10 recommend doing that or it won’t be as sturdy. Once secured it’s very sturdy and not going anywhere. Makes the bathroom look much more organized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS BIG BOY!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because of its size, and amount of storage! It did not disappoint. It took me about an hr to assemble. I haven't ever built anything before. But I made this happen...I measured my space, several times to make sure. Bought ur, abs walla. Perfect fit. Good abd tall as well! Love the color. And had a perfect price!! It hood alot, and seems pretty sturdy. My son and I carried the box to the car. But he carried it into the house alone. He's 13. So not to heavy. Love it! Highly recommend ..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars untsable and poorly made
reviews.reviewText: i am so disappointed in this piece, i dont know if i just got really unlucky or what but this thing is awful. ive put together tons of this style of mdf furniture, and usually its pretty decent for the price and i don't have issues putting it together. for over the toilet organizers, this is more expensive than other ones i own, so i was hoping it would be better quality, but its genuinely worse than the $60 metal one i got from a big box store.firstly, the larger of the two back board is not solid. it is two rectangles held together with TAPE. literally thats all thats holding them together across the entire span of the middle, a big piece of tape that youre meant to leave there. as you can guess, that makes the whole thing wobbly and provides little to no support, and also makes it a real PITA when installing it into the grooves, because it wants to fold and flop out. it also appears to be sized too small, since once fully constructed the whole piece came unseated from the groove almost immediately and now just flops around in there. so thats fun.the doors are another major pain- adjusting them so they are sitting level and look even is an exercise in frustration, and there is no way to make it so there isnt a pretty large gap between them that shows into the cabinet. the screws meant to loosen so you can move them left or right are very imprecise and if i move them any further, they fall out, so theyre at their limit. theres also the annoying fact that the only thing keeping the doors from bowing into the cabinet is that shelf inside acting as a door stop. the loud CLONK they make hitting the shelf is annoying enough, as is the force of them knocking things over inside of it, but it also means that if you didnt want the shelf in there, youre SOL.the worst part though is that the whole thing is so, SO wobbly and rickety. even double checking every single screw, the thing wobbles freely left to right in and out of square so badly that just trying to open the doors makes it shift. in an attempt to make it less wobbly i bought some plastic corner brackets and installed a bunch, and that seems to have worked for the time being, but cmon. i mean you cant even level the doors like the instructions say until youve used corner brackets, because moving the door at all is enough to shift all the pieces.i wish i could return this awful piece of furniture, but we had already recycled the boxes and now drilled more holes trying to make it workable. so annoyed that i paid a hundred and thirty dollars for such a garbage quality product, absolutely avoid this or at least keep the boxes and everything until you see it fully together.
